feed.subtitle: We're ringing in the New Year with a bang! David Beckham is showing his good in his new man-panty line for H&M. Take a peek at the bulge-tastic pic!

content.div:
If we weren't already excited enough to say goodbye to 2011, now we have even more reasons to celebrate the New Year. David Beckham is gettin' down to his skivvies in a new ad for his manty line for H&M.

The famous soccer stud bares (almost) all in the new ad, and let's face it, there isn't too much left to the imagination.

Seriously, Victoria Beckham has it all doesn't she? A fierce wardrobe, shoes to die for and a drool-worthy model as a hubby. Can you say jeals?

Beckham’s latest underwear line hits H&M shelves on Feb. 2, 2012. -mirandaf@dose.ca

link.Abstract: Check out the outfits that the Kate Middleton has shown off during her and Prince William's visit to Canada.

link.Abstract: Britain's Prince William and his fiancée Kate Middleton have been an item for years. As a result, Kate has been in the media spotlight ever since she graduated from university. Take a look at how her fashion sense and camera awareness have evolved over that period. (Photos by Getty Images)
